Main pronunciation 主要发音: ěr

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) a role up spindle (now) meaning you.

English senses 英语理解: you; that, those; final particle

Usage example 用法举例: 尔等 ěr děng (you)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 253

Shuowen 说文解字: 詞之必然也從入｜八八象气之分散皃

尒字的基本解释

尒
ěr
古同“尔”。

尒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ěr］
［《廣韻》兒氏切，上紙，日。］
亦作“尒1”。“尔1”的繁体字。
(1)代词。你们；你。
(2)代词。此，这个。
(3)代词。彼，那个。
(4)代词。如此，这样。
(5)助词。用作词缀，犹“然”。
(6)助词。用于句末。a.表限止。相当于“而已”。
(7)助词。用于句末。b.表肯定。相当于“呢”、“呀”。
(8)助词。用于句末。c.表疑问。犹乎。
(9)应诺声。犹是。
(10)通“薾”。花盛貌。
(11)通“邇”。近。
(12)通“邇”。浅近。

Basic explanation of words
thou
ěr
Gu Tong "Er".
thou
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ěr]
["Guangyun" cut by children, put on paper, day. ]
Also known as "尒1". Traditional characters for "尔1".
(1) Pronouns. You; you.
(2) Pronouns. This, this.
(3) Pronouns. He, that.
(4) Pronouns. So, this way.
(5) Particles. Used as an affix, still "ran".
(6) Particles. Used at the end of a sentence. a. Table limit. Equivalent to "just".
(7) Particles. Used at the end of a sentence. b. The table is affirmative. It is equivalent to "Nah" and "Yah".
(8) Particles. Used at the end of a sentence. c. Form a question. Still.
(9) Promises. Still yes.
(10) Through "薾". Flower prosperous appearance.
(11) Through "near". near.
(12) Through "near". simple.
